reference.shortdesc: The apiname element provides the name of an application programming interface (API) such as a Java class name or method name.

section.title: Usage information
section.draft-comment: Stick this ph in a library topic for conref if it's to be used in all programming domain element descriptions.
section.ph: This element is part of the DITA programming domain, a special set of DITA elements designed to document programming tasks, concepts, and reference information.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: Use the document.write method to create text output in the dynamically constructed view.
